trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for the configuration elements that specify predefined bindings provided by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 提供基底類別指定的組態項目預先定義的繫結[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: This class defines a binding configuration element that can be used to describe an aspect of how an endpoint communicates with others in the network.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會定義可用來描述端點如何與端點的通訊與其他網路中的繫結組態項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.StandardBindingElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.StandardBindingElement"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.StandardBindingElement"></xref> class with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.StandardBindingElement"></xref>具有指定名稱的類別。

trans-unit.source: A name that uniquely identifies this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 名稱可唯一識別這個組態項目。

trans-unit.source: Applies the content of the specified binding to this binding configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 指定的繫結的內容套用至這個繫結組態項目。

trans-unit.source: The `Name` of the standard binding specified in `binding` is ignored during this operation.
trans-unit.target: `Name`中指定的標準繫結`binding`會忽略這項操作。

trans-unit.source: This is because the `Name` attribute of a binding is used in conjunction with the `Namespace` attribute of the same binding to generate the correct WSDL for a binding.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為`Name`屬性繫結的用於搭配`Namespace`相同的繫結產生正確的 WSDL 繫結的屬性。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.StandardBindingElement.Name%2A> property of this type is mainly used as a key to identify this binding element in the binding collection.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.StandardBindingElement.Name%2A>此型別的屬性主要是用做為索引鍵來識別此繫結集合中的繫結項目。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.StandardBindingElement.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.StandardBindingElement.Name%2A> property is not modified during this operation.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.StandardBindingElement.Name%2A>屬性則不會在此作業期間修改。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.StandardBindingElement.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: A binding.
trans-unit.target: 繫結。

trans-unit.source: binding is .
trans-unit.target: bindingis .

trans-unit.source: The type of this binding element is different from the type specified by binding.
trans-unit.target: 這個繫結項目的型別是所指定的型別不同 binding 。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <xref:System.Type> object that represents the custom binding element.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得<xref:System.Type>表示自訂繫結項目的物件。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> object that represents the custom binding type.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>物件，表示自訂繫結類型。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval of time provided for a close operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定供關閉作業完成其作業的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies how long the close operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan>，指定必須逾時前完成關閉作業的時間長度。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Initializes this binding configuration element with the content of the specified binding.
trans-unit.target: 初始化這個繫結組態項目，以指定的繫結的內容。

trans-unit.source: A binding.
trans-unit.target: 繫結。

trans-unit.source: binding is .
trans-unit.target: bindingis .

trans-unit.source: The type of this binding element is different from the type specified by binding.
trans-unit.target: 這個繫結項目的型別是所指定的型別不同 binding 。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定繫結的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Each instance of a binding has a name and namespace that together uniquely identify it in the metadata of the service.
trans-unit.target: 繫結的每個執行個體都有名稱和命名空間這兩者可一起在服務中繼資料內唯一識別此。

trans-unit.source: The name of the binding.
trans-unit.target: 繫結的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Called when the content of a specified binding element is applied to this binding configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 指定的繫結項目的內容套用至這個繫結組態項目時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: A binding.
trans-unit.target: 繫結。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval of time provided for an open operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定供開啟作業完成其作業的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies how long the open operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan>，指定必須逾時前完成開啟作業的時間長度。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref>包含集合的執行個體<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref>可能是屬性的物件或<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>這個組態項目的物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"> </xref>包含集合的執行個體<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref>可能是屬性的物件或<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>這個組態項目的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval of time provided for a receive operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定供接收作業完成的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies how long the receive operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan>，指定必須逾時前完成接收作業的時間長度。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Resets the internal state of this configuration element object, including the locks and the properties collections.
trans-unit.target: 重設這個組態項目物件，包括鎖定和屬性集合的內部狀態。

trans-unit.source: The parent node of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 這個組態項目的父節點。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval of time provided for a send operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定供傳送作業完成的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies how long the send operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan>，指定傳送作業已逾時前完成的時間長度。</xref:System.TimeSpan>
